statements: SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age ASC;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30 AND insurance_provider = 'ABC Insurance';
SELECT patient_name, patient_address, insurance_provider FROM Patients WHERE insurance_provider IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender, patient_address FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' AND patient_age BETWEEN 25 AND 50 ORDER BY patient_id ASC
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider FROM Patients WHERE patient_address LIKE '%Street%' AND insurance_provider IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_name ASC, patient_age DESC
SELECT patient_name, insurance_policy_no FROM Patients WHERE insurance_policy_no LIKE '%-ABC' AND patient_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY insurance_policy_no ASC
SELECT patient_id, insurance_provider FROM Patients WHERE insurance_provider IN ('Company A', 'Company B') ORDER BY patient_id DESC
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, insurance_provider FROM patients WHERE dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE insurance_provider = 'BlueCross';
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY bill_amount DESC;
SELECT patient_id, SUM(bill_amount) AS total_bills FROM bills GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_bills > 1000;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, sum(bill_amount) as total_bills FROM bills GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN bills ON patients.patient_id = bills.patient_id WHERE bills.payment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE insurance_provider LIKE '%Blue Cross%';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, address FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider FROM Patients WHERE insurance_provider='Company A';
SELECT * FROM Bills WHERE payment_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, insurance_provider FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Insurances.coverage_description FROM Patients JOIN Insurances ON Patients.insurance_provider = Insurances.insurance_provider;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Bills.amount, Bills.payment_date FROM Patients JOIN Bills ON Patients.patient_id = Bills.patient_id WHERE Bills.amount > 1000 ORDER BY Bills.payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Hospitals;
SELECT hospital_name, address FROM Hospitals WHERE hospital_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT bill_id, total_amount, payment_status FROM BillingInformation WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT provider_name, policy_number FROM InsuranceInformation WHERE insurance_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM Hospitals WHERE hospital_id = 1;
SELECT hospital_name, address FROM Hospitals WHERE hospital_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE insurance_provider IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, BillingInformation.total_amount FROM Patients JOIN BillingInformation ON Patients.patient_id = BillingInformation.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT last_name, first_name, insurance_provider FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital_name FROM Doctors JOIN Hospitals ON Doctors.hospital_id = Hospitals.hospital_id;
SELECT insurance_name, contact_info FROM InsuranceCompanies WHERE insurance_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE insurance_provider='ABC Insurance' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT Patients.first_name, Hospital.hospital_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN Doctors ON Patients.patient_id = Doctors.doctor_id INNER JOIN Hospitals ON Doctors.hospital_id = Hospitals.hospital_id;

SELECT Billing.amount, Patients.first_name, Hospitals.location FROM Billing INNER JOIN Patients ON Billing.patient_id = Patients.patient_id INNER JOIN Doctors ON Patients.patient_id = Doctors.doctor_id INNER JOIN Hospitals ON Doctors.hospital_id = Hospitals.hospital_id WHERE Billing.payment_status='Paid';
